show_name: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Ncha! Penguin Mura yori Ai o Komete (movie)
other_title: Dr. Slump e Arale: Avventura nello spazio (Italian)
Dr. Slump e Arale: Dal Villaggio Pinguino con amore (Italian)
怪博士與機器娃娃 嗯加！來自企鵝村的祝福 (Chinese (Taiwan))
Ｄｒ．スランプ アラレちゃん んちゃ！ペンギン村より愛をこめて
plot: Unable to entertain their princess Puruah, the kingdom of Yapaya requests professor Senbei to create a comedic robot capable of making her laugh for the first time in her life.
